pilots.name: “Midnight”
pilots.caption: Omega Leader
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if you have a lock on the enemy ship, that ship's dice cannot be modified.

pilots.name: Commander Malarus
pilots.caption: First Order Enforcer
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge] and gain 1 stress token. If you do, until the end of the round, while you defend or perform an attack, you may change all of your [Focus] results to [Evade] or [Hit] results.

pilots.name: “Scorch”
pilots.caption: Zeta Leader
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token to roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: “Static”
pilots.caption: Omega Ace
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, you may spend your lock on the defender and a focus token to change all of your results to [Critical Hit] results.

pilots.name: “Longshot”
pilots.caption: Zeta Ace
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack at attack range 3, roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: Omega Squadron Ace
pilots.text: Only pilots who have demonstrated both exceptional skill and unwavering dedication are rewarded with coveted positions in the First Order squadrons operating secretly against the New Republic during the Cold War.

pilots.name: “Muse”
pilots.caption: Epsilon Leader
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-1. If you do, that ship removes 1 stress token.

pilots.name: TN-3465
pilots.caption: Loose End
pilots.ability: While another friendly ship performs an attack, if you are at range 0-1 of the defender, you may suffer 1 [Critical Hit] damage to change 1 of the attacker's results to a [Critical Hit] result.

pilots.name: Zeta Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: Unhampered by a cumbersome galactic bureaucracy, technologies originally researched by the Empire's TIE Advanced program are now mass-produced on First Order starfighters. As a result, TIE/fo pilots enjoy higher survival rates than their predecessors in the Galactic Empire.

pilots.name: Epsilon Squadron Cadet
pilots.text: Trained from childhood aboard Resurgent-class Star Destroyers in deep space, many First Order TIE pilots have never even set foot on a planet's surface.

pilots.name: Lieutenant Rivas
pilots.caption: Inconvenient Witness
pilots.ability: After a ship at range 1-2 gains a red or orange token, if you do not have that ship locked, you may acquire a lock on that ship.

pilots.name: “Null”
pilots.caption: Epsilon Ace
pilots.ability: While you are not damaged, treat your initiative value as 7.

pilots.name: “Quickdraw”

shipAbility.name: Heavy Weapon Turret
shipAbility.text: You can rotate your [Single Turret Arc] indicator only to your [Front Arc] or [Rear Arc]. You must treat the [Front Arc] requirement of your equipped [Missile] upgrades as [Single Turret Arc].

pilots.caption: Defiant Duelist
pilots.ability: After you lose a shield, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, you may perform a bonus primary attack.

pilots.name: Zeta Squadron Survivor
pilots.text: Humiliated by their failure, the remaining pilots from Starkiller Base are eager to prove their worth in pursuit of the Resistance.

shipAbility.name: Heavy Weapon Turret
shipAbility.text: You can rotate your [Single Turret Arc] indicator only to your [Front Arc] or [Rear Arc]. You must treat the [Front Arc] requirement of your equipped [Missile] upgrades as [Single Turret Arc].

pilots.name: Zeta Squadron Survivor
pilots.text: Humiliated by their failure, the remaining pilots from Starkiller Base are eager to prove their worth in pursuit of the Resistance.

shipAbility.name: Heavy Weapon Turret
shipAbility.text: You can rotate your [Single Turret Arc] indicator only to your [Front Arc] or [Rear Arc]. You must treat the [Front Arc] requirement of your equipped [Missile] upgrades as [Single Turret Arc].

pilots.name: “Backdraft”

shipAbility.name: Heavy Weapon Turret
shipAbility.text: You can rotate your [Single Turret Arc] indicator only to your [Front Arc] or [Rear Arc]. You must treat the [Front Arc] requirement of your equipped [Missile] upgrades as [Single Turret Arc].

pilots.caption: Fiery Fanatic
pilots.ability: While you perform a [Single Turret Arc] primary attack, if the defender is in your [Rear Arc], roll 1 additional die.

pilots.name: Omega Squadron Expert
pilots.text: The TIE/sf is a versatile starfighter that carries specialized armament and experimental systems for long-range operations by First Order Special Forces.

shipAbility.name: Heavy Weapon Turret
shipAbility.text: You can rotate your [Single Turret Arc] indicator only to your [Front Arc] or [Rear Arc]. You must treat the [Front Arc] requirement of your equipped [Missile] upgrades as [Single Turret Arc].

pilots.name: Captain Phasma

shipAbility.name: Heavy Weapon Turret
shipAbility.text: You can rotate your [Single Turret Arc] indicator only to your [Front Arc] or [Rear Arc]. You must treat the [Front Arc] requirement of your equipped [Missile] upgrades as [Single Turret Arc].

pilots.caption: Scyre Survivor
pilots.ability: While you defend, after the Neutralize Results step, another friendly ship at range 0-1 must suffer 1 [Hit]/[Critical Hit] damage to cancel 1 matching result.

pilots.name: Lieutenant LeHuse

shipAbility.name: Heavy Weapon Turret
shipAbility.text: You can rotate your [Single Turret Arc] indicator only to your [Front Arc] or [Rear Arc]. You must treat the [Front Arc] requirement of your equipped [Missile] upgrades as [Single Turret Arc].

pilots.caption: Unflinching Executioner
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, you may spend another friendly ship's lock on the defender to reroll any number of your results.

pilots.name: Kylo Ren

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.caption: Tormented Apprentice
pilots.ability: After you defend, you may spend 1 [Force] to assign the I'll Show You the Dark Side condition to the attacker.

pilots.name: “Recoil”

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.caption: Quantity Over Quality
pilots.ability: While you are stressed, you may treat enemy ships in your [Front Arc] at range 0-1 as being in your [Bullseye Arc].

pilots.name: First Order Test Pilot
pilots.text: Engineered for incredible speed and precise handling, the TIE Silencer is devastating in the hands of those who can unlock its full potential. Any lesser pilot could easily be overwhelmed and lose control of the nimble craft.

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.name: First Order Test Pilot
pilots.text: Engineered for incredible speed and precise handling, the TIE Silencer is devastating in the hands of those who can unlock its full potential. Any lesser pilot could easily be overwhelmed and lose control of the nimble craft.

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.name: “Blackout”

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.caption: Ill-Fated Test Pilot
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, if the attack is obstructed by an obstacle, the defender rolls 2 fewer defense dice.

pilots.name: “Blackout”

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.caption: Ill-Fated Test Pilot
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, if the attack is obstructed by an obstacle, the defender rolls 2 fewer defense dice.

pilots.name: “Avenger”

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.caption: Wrathful Wingmate
pilots.ability: After another friendly ship is destroyed, you may perform an action, even while stressed.

pilots.name: Sienar-Jaemus Engineer
pilots.text: Developed by Sienar-Jaemus Fleet Systems as a successor to the vaunted TIE Defender, the TIE/vn Silencer incorporates bleeding-edge technologies developed at research facilities hidden in the Unknown Regions.

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.name: Sienar-Jaemus Engineer
pilots.text: Developed by Sienar-Jaemus Fleet Systems as a successor to the vaunted TIE Defender, the TIE/vn Silencer incorporates bleeding-edge technologies developed at research facilities hidden in the Unknown Regions.

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.name: “Rush”

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.caption: Adrenaline Junkie
pilots.ability: While you are damaged, treat your initiative as 6.

pilots.name: Lieutenant Tavson

shipAbility.name: Linked Battery
shipAbility.text: While you perform a [Cannon] attack, roll 1 additional die.

pilots.caption: Obedient Shuttle Pilot
pilots.ability: After you suffer damage, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform an action.

pilots.name: Lieutenant Dormitz

shipAbility.name: Linked Battery
shipAbility.text: While you perform a [Cannon] attack, roll 1 additional die.

pilots.caption: Hypercomms Specialist
pilots.ability: Setup: After you are placed, other friendly ships can be placed anywhere in the play area at range 0-2 of you.

pilots.name: Starkiller Base Pilot
pilots.text: The Upsilon-class command shuttle serves as a base of operations for many of the First Order's senior officers and agents. Its powerful sensors and communications equipment allow them to orchestrate the spread of terror across the galaxy.

shipAbility.name: Linked Battery
shipAbility.text: While you perform a [Cannon] attack, roll 1 additional die.

pilots.name: Major Stridan

shipAbility.name: Linked Battery
shipAbility.text: While you perform a [Cannon] attack, roll 1 additional die.

pilots.caption: Stentorian Commander
pilots.ability: While you coordinate or resolve the effect of one of your upgrades, you may treat friendly ships at range 2-3 as being at range 0 or range 1.

pilots.name: Captain Cardinal

shipAbility.name: Linked Battery
shipAbility.text: While you perform a [Cannon] attack, roll 1 additional die.

pilots.caption: Principled Instructor
pilots.ability: While a friendly ship at range 1-2 with lower initiative than you defends or performs an attack, if you have at least 1 [Charge], that ship may reroll 1 [Focus] result. After an enemy ship at range 0-3 is destroyed, lose 1 [Charge].

pilots.name: Petty Officer Thanisson

shipAbility.name: Linked Battery
shipAbility.text: While you perform a [Cannon] attack, roll 1 additional die.

pilots.caption: Alert Flight Controller
pilots.ability: During the Activation or Engagement Phase, after a ship in your [Front Arc] at range 0-2 gains 1 stress token, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, that ship gains 1 tractor token.

pilots.name: First Order Provocateur
pilots.text: Major Vonreg's vision guided the enhancement of proven designs while engineering this one-of-a-kind precise and lethal craft from Sienar-Jaemus Fleet Systems.

shipAbility.name: Fine-Tuned Thrusters
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a maneuver, if you are not depleted or strained, you may gain 1 deplete or strain token to perform a [Lock] or [Barrel Roll] action.

pilots.name: “Ember”

shipAbility.name: Fine-Tuned Thrusters
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a maneuver, if you are not depleted or strained, you may gain 1 deplete or strain token to perform a [Lock] or [Barrel Roll] action.

pilots.caption: Dying Flame
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, if there is a damaged ship friendly to the defender at range 0-1 of the defender, the defender cannot spend focus or calculate tokens.

pilots.name: “Holo”

shipAbility.name: Fine-Tuned Thrusters
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a maneuver, if you are not depleted or strained, you may gain 1 deplete or strain token to perform a [Lock] or [Barrel Roll] action.

pilots.caption: Trick of the Light
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you must transfer 1 of your tokens to another friendly ship at range 0-2.

pilots.name: Major Vonreg

shipAbility.name: Fine-Tuned Thrusters
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a maneuver, if you are not depleted or strained, you may gain 1 deplete or strain token to perform a [Lock] or [Barrel Roll] action.

pilots.caption: Red Baron
pilots.ability: During the System Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc]. That ship gains 1 deplete or strain token of your choice.

pilots.name: First Order Collaborators
pilots.text: The First Order's supporters make use of former Imperial vessels, such as the Raider-class corvette. Though it has outlived the regime that created it, this craft still spreads terror across the galaxy.

shipAbility.name: Concentrated Batteries
shipAbility.text: While you perform a primary, [Torpedo], or [Missile] attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], roll 1 additional die.

pilots.name: First Order Sympathizers
pilots.text: The First Order's swift rise to power rests upon ruthless innovation. However, sympathizers often repurpose Imperial designs, like the venerable Gozanti-class cruiser, in surveillance and patrol operations.

shipAbility.name: Docking Clamps
shipAbility.text: You can dock up to 4 small ships.
